successes.title: SmartThings: Make Your World Smarter
successes.description: Adding intelligence to everyday things in your world, so that your life can be more awesome.

Pledges.description: FRIENDS: Are you sure you don't want a SmartThings Package below? Well, at least you'll get status updates and priority access to SmartThings Kits when they are widely available. You'll also get our thanks. Every bit helps!
SUPER EARLY BIRD: Get a SmartThings Hub and 3 Things. No monthly fees. This is a great deal, in case you were wondering.
EARLY BIRD: Just missed the Super Early Bird level? This is the next best thing. Get a SmartThings Hub and 3 Things. No monthly fees. Still an amazing deal.
EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL: Get a SmartThings Hub and 3 Things in 2012. All Kickstarters with any SmartThings Pack get free service on their pack forever. $25 OFF Pre-Order pledge.
PRE-ORDER: Get a SmartThings Hub and 3 Things in 2012. No monthly fees.

DEVELOPER & MAKER KIT: Early Access plus 1 SmartThings Hub, 3 SmartThings, or 2 SmartThing Modules or SmartThings Shields for Arduino. No monthly fees. Software Development Kit (SDK) and Cloud Platform API - everything you need to develop SmartThings-friendly software and integrate your device or app directly with SmartThings. And a whole lot of love!

DOUBLE PACK: Get 2 SmartThings Packs - one more for yourself, one for a gift, or one for your parents. The contents of this new level are EXACTLY the same as the Early Bird and Early Adopter pledges put together. You get 2 times the awesome. Two hubs, 6 things, service is free forever for both packs. To get yours now you need to change your pledge level, just click Manage Your Pledge, change your pledge amount and select the Double Pack reward.
ENTHUSIAST: Let's face it. You're a pretty big deal. 1 SmartThings Hub + 10 Things + no monthly fees AND the opportunity to vote on the next things we create.
JUST FOR YOU TIER - You know who you are. Make all of our dreams come true!
PARTNERS: You get a t-shirt! Just kidding. Let's talk.
